channel.description: 19 Ansible, Puppet, and Chef 6.0 Automation and Programmability 6.6 Recognize the capabilities of configuration mechanisms Puppet, Chef, and Ansible Configuration Drift The on-device manual configuration process does not track change history: which lines changed, what changed on each line, what old configuration was removed, who changed the configuration, when each change was made. External systems used by good systems management processes, like trouble ticketing and change management software, may record details.
